colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @007B (CES DBEN SA THUN MONG MA YIN PA'I 'PHO 'KHRID RIN PO CHE'I LCAGS KYU ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI LUNG RTOGS YON TAN DU MAS THUGS BRGYUD GDAMS SHING RNAM MANG RIGS GNAS KYI MDZAD LA MANG BRNYED PA SENG GI RI KHROD KYI GNAS BLA MA DGE SLONG DGE 'DUN CHOS 'PHEL GYIS BSKUL NGOR PAn CHEN THAMS CAD MKHYEN PA YAB SRAS DANG, MKHAN PO KHRI RIN PO CHE SOGS YONGS 'DZIN BZHI BCU LHAG TZAM BKA' DRIN GYIS 'TSO ZHING, KHYAD PAR SHAR RTZE RDO RJE 'CHANG GI BKA' DRIN LA BSTEN NAS DBEN SA SNYAN RGYUD KYI MAN NGAG KHYAD PAR CAN MANG DU THOS PA, DKA' CHEN BYANG CHUB RIN CHEN GYIS DBEN GNAS SENG @008A *, ,GE'I RI KHROD KYI BSTI GNAS, GNAS BLA MA'I GZIMS CHUNG DGA' LDAN GRUB PHUGS SU SBYAR BA'I YI GE PA NI GNAS BLA MA NYID KYIS BGYIS PA'O,, ,,SARBA MANGGA LAm, ,)
